price: 48. Waxaana u muuqan (ciqaabka) xumaantay kasbadeen, oo waxaa ku dhici waxay ku jees-jeesi jireen (oo cadaab ah).
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā kasabū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
